string.text: Sexual Orientation
Player character can choose what gender the player can marry.
Player character can have multiple marriages at once.
Player character's spouses can get each other pregnant.
Player character can marry closely related family members.
Displays mod developer debug information in the game's message log.
Player character can marry characters that are already married.
Retry Courtship
Player can retry courtship after failure.
Skip Courtship
Player can skip courtship and marry immediately.
Template Character
Set the template character that is used to set the hero name, skills, and equipment for commoners.
Changes pregnancy behavior to allow pregnancy with multiple spouses.
Reset Courtships
Reset ended courtships with a press of a button!
Player Clan
Player clan persists after marriage. By default the clan only persists if playing as a male.
Clan Leader
Player replaces clan leader after marriage. By default the a male player can replace a female leader.
